name: Loco Rojo
description: Still In Development - Choose a difficulty and catch the blue runaway. -Arrow Keys to move - Time slows in Blue's radius and you have no control over Sr. Rojo until you leave the radius. - Best played in full screen. -"P" to reset. -"Esc" or "Ctrl" to pause. -Once Blue is caught, "M" to see the map, and "N" to get out of the map. (legs not included in hitboxes)
